column5: We have an inviting room completely furnished with all you might need to make your stay pleasant : Queen size bed,dresser, mirror, closet,flat screen TV with DVD player, cable TV and internet access, fridge and microwave, coffeemaker, Alarm stereo cd player,iron with iron board,towels and linens, other ammenities. This place has been convenient for people coming to work in the area, you will be near not only your job site but entertaining places and the beach which is only 25 min.
